external_games.name: Elixir of Imortality: Hidden Object Game

name: Elixir of Imortality: Hidden Object Game
summary: Journey to a foreboding island as you go on the hunt for a murderer in this hidden object mystery adventure! Gather evidence and track down the criminal before they strike again. Discover a wealth of buried secrets as you explore the mysterious island. Can you find the legendary Elixir of Immortality that so many have tried to find! And do you dare to drink it?
